name: Big Road Company
description:
GAME MAY TAKE A BIT TO LOAD - BE PATIENT!

Made for a game jam with the theme "Connections" Try not to go in debt while making the world's best road company. If the blurry pixel art is too much for you, download the game to see it in HD (if you have a linux system, that is)

Controls  -

ONE to switch to road

TWO for building (Spawns cars)

THREE for billboard (Cars in radius spawn 5$)
